data.name: Happy! the Hippo Demo
data.detailed_description:
Run, jump, roll, and bounce through six expansive levels pushing the limits of next-generation hardware! Help Happy free collect each of the magical watermelons tucked away within each level. Take on three unique boss fights, and bring an end to the evil Sir Grimbleton’s reign of terror!

  • Six unique levels pushing next-gen technology to its limits!
  • Three insane boss fights to challenge your skills!
  • Thousands of collectible items to find!
  • Satisfying movement that's easy to learn and difficult, but fulfilling, to master!

DEVELOPER NOTE
This is a direct PC port of Happy! the Hippo, the classic 3D platformer released for the launch of sixth-generation consoles. This port has been a solo undertaking, and is still a heavy work-in-progress. No major content has been added or modified in the porting process; all original code has been translated to C++ for ease of programming, and all levels, models, textures, and audio are untampered. Enjoy!

data.short_description: Welcome to the PC port of the 2001 classic, “Happy! the Hippo”! For the sake of convenience, this port is being developed in a modern engine, but rest assured that all code, visuals, gameplay, and levels remain unaltered. This is, for all intents and purposes, the original game in all its glory.
